Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: ooi_table
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Table view for Objects of Interest

This is a tabular view of objects of interests associated to a given world state. Users can select individual objects of interests and also group or ungroup them. In addition, this widget synchronizes user selection with other connected widgets that support this behaviour, such as the OOI GIS Map widget.

Preference.name: only_show
Preference.description: A comma-separated list of entity type IDs. If set, only OOIs with that entityTypeId will be shown
Preference.label: Only show types

Preference.name: enable_group_storage
Preference.description: If true, grouping information will be persisted locally
Preference.label: Enable localStorage
